channel.title: Hosting
channel.description:
Looking for a small server looking to move up to a 24/7 dedicated desktop, the specs are as follows: Quad Core 2.4gH Xeon Intel Processor 64 Bit 6 GB Ram 60 GB SSD
Internet stats: 100 MB download/ 20 MB upload/ unlimited bandwidth
Operating system: Ubuntu 14.04 LTS Linux
Software: MYSQL 5.6
If you don't know how to work Linux, not a problem. It comes with a server manager program that you run from your computer that allows you to update your source and restart your server.
Optional Additions: Functional database (MYSQL) Manager program has the following: Ban, Kick, Mute
If interested, add me on skype: Matt Puffyball

item.title: Hosting

item.title: Hosting
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“Phillipé, post:6, topic:545561”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=664444.msg4441780#msg4441780 date=1406909002]

Make one more thread about your shitty hosting service and I’ll drown a kitten in front of your family.

3 threads about it and you still don’t get the point that no one cares?

I find a much more appropriate thing to do would be to suffocate his first born child with a plastic carrier bag.

When I first wrote it I did have it written as I’d drown his family and thought that was a bit harsh.

I like your way of thinking.
[/quote]

Drowning isn’t a way you’d want anybody to go, it’s just too harsh. On the other hand ripping his first born from his arms and forcing him to watch it go blue from the neck upwards is justice enough FOR BEING A FUCKING IDIOT.[/quote]

I will now defer to you oh great Phillipe for all matters torturous.

Read full topic

Looking for a small server looking to move up to a 24/7 dedicated desktop, the specs are as follows:
Quad Core 2.4gH Xeon Intel Processor 64 Bit
6 GB Ram

100 MB download/ 20 MB upload/ unlimited bandwidth

MYSQL 5.6

If you don’t know how to work Linux, not a problem. It comes with a server manager program that you run from your computer that allows you to update your source and restart your server.

Optional Additions:
Functional database (MYSQL)
Manager program has the following: Ban, Kick, Mute

If interested, add me on skype: Matt Puffyball
